CRender

Canvas-based vector graphics rendering plugin

Quick start →

Easy to use

Built-in common base vector graphics, easily customize new graphics to expansion and secondary development

Dynamic

With different easing curves, animation is easy

Easy to interact

Built-in graphics support hover, click, drag, quickly add interaction on the graphic, one step in place
